00016 class rampunit{
00017 private:
00018         void                                                                            *rampunit_instance;
00019         rampunit_method_create_type                                     rampunit_method_create; 
00020         rampunit_method_destroy_type                            rampunit_method_destroy;

00029         rampunit_method_stop_type                                       rampunit_method_stop;
00030         rampunit_method_tick_type                                       rampunit_method_tick;
00031

00035         ~rampunit(void);        
00036 
00037         // Attribute Accessors  
00038         ramp_err attrset(t_symbol *attrname, long argc, t_atom *argv);

00040         ramp_err setFunction(t_symbol *functionName);

00043         ramp_err getFunctionParameter(t_symbol *parameterName, long *argc, t_atom **argv);
00044 
00045         // RampUnit Methods
00046         void go(short numvalues, double *values, double time);
00047         void set(short numvalues, double *values);
00048         void stop();
00049         void tick();
00050 };
